00008 #ifndef __MLPACK_CORE_KERNELS_SPHERICAL_KERNEL_H
00009 #define __MLPACK_CORE_KERNELS_SPHERICAL_KERNEL_H
00010 
00011 #include <boost/math/special_functions/gamma.hpp>
00012 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00013 
00014 namespace mlpack {
00015 namespace kernel {
00016 
00017 class SphericalKernel
00018 {
00019  public:
00020   SphericalKernel() :
00021     bandwidth(1.0),
00022     bandwidthSquared(1.0) {}
00023   SphericalKernel(double b) :
00024     bandwidth(b),
00025     bandwidthSquared(b*b) {}
00026 
00027   template<typename VecType>
00028   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00029   {
00030     return
00031       (metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b) <= bandwidthSquared) ?
00032         1.0 : 0.0;
00033   }
00046   template<typename VecType>
00047   double ConvolutionIntegral(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00048   {
00049     double distance = sqrt(metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b));
00050     if (distance >= 2.0 * bandwidth)
00051     {
00052       return 0.0;
00053     }
00054     double volumeSquared = pow(Normalizer(a.n_rows), 2.0);
00055 
00056     switch(a.n_rows)
00057     {
00058       case 1:
00059         return 1.0 / volumeSquared * (2.0 * bandwidth - distance);
00060         break;
00061       case 2:
00062         return 1.0 / volumeSquared *
00063           (2.0 * bandwidth * bandwidth * acos(distance/(2.0 * bandwidth)) -
00064           distance / 4.0 * sqrt(4.0*bandwidth*bandwidth-distance*distance));
00065         break;
00066       default:
00067         Log::Fatal << "The spherical kernel does not support convolution\
00068           integrals above dimension two, yet..." << std::endl;
00069         return -1.0;
00070         break;
00071     }
00072   }
00073   double Normalizer(size_t dimension)
00074   {
00075     return pow(bandwidth, dimension) * pow(M_PI, dimension / 2.0) /
00076              tgamma(dimension / 2.0 + 1.0);
00077   }
00078   double Evaluate(double t)
00079   {
00080     return (t <= bandwidth) ? 1.0 : 0.0;
00081   }
00082  private:
00083   double bandwidth;
00084   double bandwidthSquared;
00085 };
00086 
00087 }; // namespace kernel
00088 }; // namespace mlpack
00089 
00090 #endif
